# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Vista)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
VistaPluginInfo.C
VistaCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
VistaPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
VistaMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtVistaFileFormat.C
avtVistaAle3dFileFormat.C
avtVistaDiabloFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
VistaEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtVistaFileFormat.C
avtVistaAle3dFileFormat.C
avtVistaDiabloFileFormat.C
)

# BEGIN custom code
IF (WIN32)
    SET(EREGEX_SOURCES ${VISIT_SOURCE_DIR}/common/utility/win32-regex.c)
    SET(SOURCE_FILES_PROPERTIES ${EREGEX_SOURCES} PROPERTIES LANGUAGE CXX)
    SET(LIBE_SOURCES ${LIBE_SOURCES} ${EREGEX_SOURCES})

    SET(MREGEX_SOURCES ${VISIT_SOURCE_DIR}/common/utility/win32-regex.c)
    SET(SOURCE_FILES_PROPERTIES ${MREGEX_SOURCES} PROPERTIES LANGUAGE CXX)
    SET(LIBM_SOURCES ${LIBM_SOURCES} ${MREGEX_SOURCES})
ENDIF (WIN32)
# END custom code

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Formats
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Ghost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Base
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Tet
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Zoo
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
${SILO_INCLUDE_DIR} ${HDF5_INCLUDE_DIR} 
)

IF(WIN32)
  ADD_DEFINITIONS(-D_HDF5USEDLL_)
ENDIF(WIN32)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS} ${SILO_LIBRARY_DIR} ${HDF5_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IVistaDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IVistaDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IVistaDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MVistaDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES}    )
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MVistaDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${SILO_LIB} ${HDF5_LIB} )
    SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(MVistaDatabase
        PROPERTIES
        COMPILE_FLAGS "-DMDSERVER"
    )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MVistaDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EVistaDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EVistaDatabase_ser visitcommon avtdatabase_ser avtpipeline_ser ${SILO_LIB} ${HDF5_LIB} )
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(EVistaDatabase_ser
    PROPERTIES
    COMPILE_FLAGS "-DENGINE"
)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EVistaDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EVistaDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EVistaDatabase_par visitcommon avtdatabase_par avtpipeline_par ${SILO_LIB} ${HDF5_LIB} )
    SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(EVistaDatabase_par
        PROPERTIES
        COMPILE_FLAGS "-DENGINE"
    )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EVistaDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})

VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_PREFIX(${INSTALLTARGETS})
